<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Camouflage](/Feats.aspx?ID=3099) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 41</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Hunter Automaton](/Heritages.aspx?ID=184) heritage

</column>

---

You have developed magical techniques to aid you with stalking your prey. You can cast [_blur_](/Spells.aspx?ID=28) and [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) each once per day as 2nd-level arcane innate spells.

**Enhancement** Your camouflage is more potent. Your _blur_ spell now lasts 10 minutes and when you cast _invisibility_, you can choose to gain the effects of the 4th-level version of the spell. In addition, you can now cast _blur_ and _invisibility_ each twice per day.
name: Arcane Camouflage
